name: SpeakUp! Email Petitions Importer
author: Bastho

sections.description:
A Speakup! Email petition tool that provide CSV import functionnality.

Localizations

  • French fr_FR
sections.installation:
Use the automatic installer. Or…

  1. Download and unzip the the plugin zip file.
  2. Upload the speakup-email-petitions-importer folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate SpeakUp! Email Petitions Importer through the “Plugins” menu in the WordPress admin.
sections.faq:
Where can I find a csv template ?

Go to signatures > export to csv
The plugins imports files in the same format that the export
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Fix: Check csv format for all navigators
  • Fix: More flexible for number of each lines
  • Fix: Check for quote removing
  • Fix : Prevent some PHP warnings

1.2

  • Fix: bug while import of standard plugin CSV export, tanks to Iangoggin

1.1

  • Add explanations about csv format
  • Accepts CSV width more than 16 cols
  • Fix french translation

1.0

  • Initial release
